captions.text: This is the book I told you about.
What's so interesting about this book?
If you want to meet the author, she's at the cafe.
After three years I'm back again.
But as soon I landed, I don't know why...

I had a feeling that I had never felt before,
coming back home.

My heart was beating faster and
all I could see and feel was happiness

But, I didn't know that
there was something waiting for me
You can come and talk to him some day.
He doesn't want to talk to me.
We can't figure out if he's at home or not.
Sometimes, he stays in his room all day.
Alright, aunty. I'll talk to him.
His dad was talking about the workshop.
Can you please tell him to go?
He might make some friends out there.
His friends aren't such good company.
That is the reason I'm telling you all this.

Look at him.
It's better not to talk to him at the moment.

He's already had his dinner
and gone to bed.

-What does he say?
-The food's a little cold.
He doesn't show up when I'm around.

Shall I go and talk to him
about the workshop?
I've talked to him about it.
Why do the same thing again?

I'll be busy with fieldwork
from tomorrow.
This time, I'll be away for long.
You don't need to tell me that.
I'm going to sing a song!
We've all come here today from different places.

The purpose of this workshop is
personality development.

We are not weak...
We are equal to those who can hear...
Our skills, knowledge and experience are equal.
But we need development in ourselves.
It's not me who started this workshop.

I would like to request Ms. Barsha, who inspired us
to initiate this workshop, to introduce herself.
I'm really happy to be here.
I can't hear or speak, just like you guys.

When I was a kid,
my dad taught me three important things.

Third - Don't trust others.
Believe in yourself.
Now, let us begin with the workshop.

You wanna smoke after the class?
I got some good stuff.

Don't you know that
you shouldn't smoke, you idiot?
What's it to you if I smoke?

Don't you know that smoking
is injurious to your health?

I saw a hot chick in the bus today.
But I couldn't talk to her.

Why are sitting next to me?
Grab another seat.

Why are you sitting next to me?
Stay away.

-Tell me what's this?
-I don't know. Stay away.

I won't.
Don't try to act smart.
The one with kohl in his eyes.

I was just kidding.
You guys look good together.
You'll be running after him tomorrow, won't you?

-What's wrong with her?
-She's in love, mom.
Who's the guy? We'd like to meet him.
I'm in pain and you're sleeping?

Do as you wish.
I'm sleeping.
Can you give me a thousand rupees?
You wait here. I'll get it.
Hey! Have you guys seen Barsha?

-Hey! What's the matter?
-Have you seen Barsha?

I'm going to a party tonight.
Let's go.
I won't go to your party.
You'll see some hot chicks there.

You'll meet some friends.
You'll have fun at the party.

You go on upstairs.
I'll catch you later.
You're done dancing with the boys?

Are you done or not?
Or shall I send in more boys?

Why were you rude to me
at the workshop?
There is still plenty of time.
I know tomorrow's your first date, honey.

I'm gonna sleep.
Do as you wish.
I just saw two of your lookalikes.
Two girls who look like me?
I spent a lot of time getting ready.
From America, after a long time.
I'll talk to him about our marriage.
What if your dad doesn't like me?
I love my dad very much.
I love him very much... sorry.
Who's gonna love such a junkie?

Invite him over for dinner.
We'd like to meet him.
I've got a surprise for you.

We'll get married and move to America together.
What do you think?

My dad has invited you over for dinner.
Please, come.
I need some time to think about it.
Alright, I'm very afraid of you.
This room smells full of cigarettes.

That's me when I was a kid.
I was singing.
Then why are you looking here and there?
You? Play it right now, please.

I hope we learned a lot of things
from this workshop.
I made a lot of friends.

And I'd like to wish everyone
a very good luck for your future.

We gained a lot of knowledge
from this workshop.

Everyone should keep them
in their minds.
I think this workshop was a success.
Let's give a big round of applause.

I'm having a hard time choosing the right clothes
for you and you're busy flirting!

What are you saying?
She's like a sister to me.
What were you doing out there?

What did I do?
Are you crazy?
You were having a good time.
I swear I'm not talking to you!
What the hell were you trying to do?
I'm not trying to suppress your feelings.

I don't know what happened
between you guys.
But, what you did was wrong.
To you, he is dearer than me, isn't he?
Have you talked about the guitar?

There's a guy. I've talked to him
about the guitar and the money.
You stay here. I'll be right back.
That's it? Talk to him again.
I guess you've done the talking.
Why are you worried so much?

We'll go to America and
stay there forever, won't we?
Where were you all these days?

Where have you been,
leaving me alone?

Dad had invited you over for dinner.
Do you still remember?
You better show up at my place today.

Shouldn't you be preparing the meal?
Just go.
I'll do it. I'll do it.
I am fine. How are you?

I am fine as well.
Where is Aman?
I was on the phone when he left.

He might not have gone too far.
Sit here and wait for him.

-Do you want something to drink?
-No, I'm fine, aunty.

-You shouldn't say that.
-No, It's okay, aunty.
Let me see what you're studying.
Have you done all your homework?
Have you done all your homework?
No one is getting up until I come back.

Aman. Sir asked us not to
go anywhere, didn't he?
I need to use the toilet.

Come on.
Why are you feeling shy?
Aman said awful things about you and my mother.
How long will you keep hiding?

comments.text:
Kasto man chune movie rahecha.. Sahrai ramro lagyo..Nepali movie pani yeti 
ramro banana thalecha..khusi lagyo..so simple story but very pleasant n 
hearttouching.. Brilliant acting by the lead actors.. Thumbs up guys!! 
Looking forward for more such creative work.. Arpan thapa is wonderful n 
namrata is very impressive...﻿

comments.text:
माताको दूध शिशुलाई शिक्षा मातृभाषामा, प्रभाव पर्छ सृस्‍टिलाई प्रकाशको 
गतिमा।.... यी माथिका हरफ मेघालय शिलोंगका नेपालीभाषी पुस्तक ब्यबसायी श्री 
बिष्णु गौतमले बिगत १० वर्ष देखि जोड तोडका साथ प्रचार प्रसार गर्दै आएका छन् 
। उनले प्रकाशन गरेका पुस्तक, बिजक, लेटर प्याड, पुस्तक सुची जताततै यी हरफ 
देख्न पाइन्छ । नेपाली, अंग्रेजी, खासी र बंगाली भाषामा लेखिएका यी हरफले 
मातृभाषाको शक्तिले सृष्टिको रक्षा र यस सुन्दर बहुरंगी विश्व-बाटिकालाइ द्रुत 
गतिमा सुमुन्नत बनाउन टेवा मिल्ने संदेश दिन्छ ।. जन्मेपछि सम्बाद गर्न सिकेको 
पहिलो भाषा नै मानिसको मातृभाषा हो । संसारमा ज्ञान, सोच र कल्पनाको बहुरंगी 
विविधता कायम राख्न पनि मातृभाषालाइ बचाईराख्न र विकास गर्न जरुरि छ । 
मातृभाषामा दिइने शिक्षाले सम्बन्धित भाषा त्यसको लिपि, जातीय संस्कार र 
संस्कृतिको विकास तथा समाजमा उत्प्रेरणा र चेतनाको अभिवृद्धि हुन्छ । यदि कुनै 
भाषा लोप भएर गयो भने त्यस जतिको संस्कृति पनि लोप भएर जान्छ । संस्कृतिक 
सम्वृद्धिमा सबैभन्दा ठूलो योगदान भाषाको नै हुन्छ । मातृभाषामा दिइने 
अभिव्यक्ति सबैभन्दा परिपूर्ण र सहज हुन्छ । यदि मातृभाषा सम्पन्न भयनन भने 
संसारमा धेरै कारोबार हुने सम्पर्क भाषाको अवस्था पनि खोक्रो हुन जानेछ । 
ससाना हजारौ मातृभाषाका कारणले नै संसारका सम्पर्क भाषा सम्पन्न र हराभरा भएका 
हुन् । यदि कारोबारी भाषामा लिप्त भएर मातृभाषाको लोप भयो भने ज्ञान बिज्ञानको 
संसार उराठिलो मरुभूमि जस्तो बन्ने छ । त्यसैले शिक्षा मातृभाषामै हुनु पर्छ । 
मातृभाषा मानिसको मौलिक ज्ञान, शिप सृजनाको खजाना हो । यस्तो महत्वपूर्ण 
खजानाको रक्षामा ध्यान नदिएर क्षणिक लाभको निम्ति कारोबारमा चलेका भाषामा 
मात्र लिप्त हुनु समाजको भविस्य माथि गरेको बेइमानी र बाल अधिकारको हनन हो ।. 
प्रसिद्ध साहित्यकार रवीन्द्रनाथ टैगोरले भनेका छन्, ‘मातृभाषामा शिक्षा पाउनु 
मानिसको जन्मसिद्ध अधिकार हो । हामी जसरी आमाको कोखमा जन्मेका हौं त्यसैगरी 
मातृभाषा पनि हाम्रो कोख हो । यी दुवै आमा हाम्रालागि सधैं सजीव र अपरिहार्य 
छन् ।’ उनले मातृभाषाको महत्त्वलाई बुझे र बुझाउने कोसिस गरे । प्रसिद्ध 
राजनीतिज्ञ नेलसन मण्डेलाले भनेका छन्- इफ यू स्पिक टु अ म्यान इन अ ल्याङ्वेज 
ही अन्डरस्ट्यान्डस, इट गोज् टु हिज माइन्ड बट इफ यू स्पिक इन हिज ल्याङ्वेज 
इट गोज टु हिज हर्ट । यदि कसैसँग उसले बुझ्ने भाषामा कुरा गर्नुभयो भने त्यो 
कुरा उसको दिमागमा मात्र पुग्छ । यदि उसको मातृभाषामा भन्नुभयो भने मुटुसम्म 
पुग्छ । मण्डेलाले मातृभाषाको द्रुत असरलाई प्रस्ट्याए ।. संयुक्त 
राष्ट्रसंघको अध्ययनअनुसार यतिबेला कारोबारमा नचलेका करिब ५३०० मातृभाषा 
संकटमा परेका छन् । शिक्षामा मातृभाषाको महत्त्वलाई नजरअन्दाज गरेर अबको 
शिक्षानीति बनाइयो भने सामाजिक र राष्ट्रिय मात्र होइन मानव जातिकै अस्तित्व 
संकटमा आउन सक्ने स्थिति बन्नेछ । संयुक्त राष्ट्रसंघमा सन् १९९९ बाट यस 
मुद्दाले स्थान पाइसकेको छ । अब यसलाई संसारभरि उपयुक्त कार्यान्वयनको खाँचो छ 
।. 
*___________________________________________________________________________________* 
सर्व शिक्षा मातृभाषामा नहुनु सुक्षम गतिमा दास हुनु हो | बग्ने पानी पुग्दैन 
वर्षा नै चाईन्छ, सुसम्पन्न समाज बनाउन सर्व शिक्षा मातृभाषा मा चाईन्छ 
मनपर्‍योमनपर्‍यो · · Share PMO-Narendra Modiलाई मनपर्‍यो﻿
